Key Match Events: Jamie Leweling scored the only goal of the game with a first-time rocket into the roof of the net.
Oliver Baumann made two incredible saves to protect a clean sheet on his debut.
Pre-Game Insights: Before the game, the Allianz Arena stood to applaud Germany legends Manuel Neuer, Toni Kroos, Ilkay Gundogan, and Thomas Muller.
Post-Match Reflections: Jamie Leweling came into the side and thrived, showcasing great attitude and ability to quickly shake off the disappointment of the dream start which had been snatched away from him.
Julian Nagelsmann and Germany fans alike can be excited about the future with Leweling leading the way.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany controlled the opening stages of the game, with Brighton & Hove Albion goalkeeper Bart Verbruggen called into action a handful of times to keep the hosts at bay.
Netherlands looked to hit back and came close through late strikes from Xavi Simons and Donyell Malen, but Oliver Baumann made two incredible saves to protect a clean sheet.
